sources.title: The Thirteenth Guest
sources.description: A young woman visits her childhood home, shuttered some 13 years after the fateful night her father died at the dinner table while they waited for a 13th guest. While reminiscing, she hears a noise. Frightened, she begins to explore. She screams. A shot is fired. On arrival, the police find the stiffened body of a young woman sitting at the dinner table. Stars: Ginger Rogers, Lyle Talbot, and J. Farrell MacDonald IMDb Page The 659MB MPEG4 was derived from the 2.9GB MPEG2 on this page .

sources.title: The Thirteenth Guest (1932) [Mystery]
sources.description:
If you like this movie and our channel, please subscribe: https://goo.gl/0qDmXe | "The Thirteenth Guest" (1932) is an American mystery film, released on August 9, 1932. The film is also known as "Lady Beware" in the United Kingdom. It was based on the 1929 novel by crime fiction writer Armitage Trail best known for writing "Scarface".

The films opens on an old abandoned house and our leading character, Marie Morgan (Ginger Rogers). As she sits down at the banquet table inside, she thinks back to the banquet that was held there 13 years before. A banquet set for 13 guests. However the 13th guest to this banquet never arrived. Now, 13 years later, the 12 attending guests are being murdered and set once again at the banquet table.

---

Directed by Albert Ray, produced by M.H. Hoffman, written by Arthur Hoerl (Screenplay)
Frances Hyland (Screenplay) and Armitage Trail (Additional Dialogue), starring Ginger Rogers, Lyle Talbot, J. Farrell MacDonald, Paul Hurst, Erville Alderson, Ethel Wales, James Eagles, Crauford Kent, Eddie Phillips and Frances Rich.

---

Source: "The Thirteenth Guest (film)" Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. Wikimedia Foundation, Inc.. 29 June 2012. Web. 29 July 2012. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Thirteenth_Guest_(Film).

If you like this movie and our channel, please subscribe: https://goo.gl/0qDmXe

sources.title: The Thirteenth Guest (1932)
sources.description: Thirteen years after a dinner party in which the thirteenth guest failed to arrive, the remaining guests are being murdered one by one, and their bodies being placed at the same dinner table in the appropriate seats they occupied thirteen years prior. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-thirteenth-guest-1932/

sources.title: Thirteenth Guest
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Thirteenth Guest (1932) GINGER ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Ginger Rogers, Lyle Talbot, J. Farrell MacDonald 
 Director: Albert Ray

 13 years before the movie opens, there was a dinner party, at which the 13th guest failed to show up. The master of the manner has died, and left the bulk of his estate to this 13th guest, but nobody knows who that is. Now someone is murdering the remaining guests, and placing their dead bodies at the table, in the same seat they had occupied 13 years before

sources.title: The Thirteenth Guest (1932) Ginger Rogers - Mystery, Romance Pre Code Film
sources.description:
Murder of a woman sparks a search for a killer.

Director: Albert Ray
Writers: Armitage Trail, Frances Hyland 
Stars: Ginger Rogers, Lyle Talbot, J. Farrell MacDonald
Genres: Drama, Mystery, Romance, Thriller, Pre Code, Psychotronic

sources.title: Thirteenth Guest _ Weirdness Bad Movie
sources.description: Public Access TV show "Weirdness Really Bad Movie" hosts public domain movies and ads clean comedy sketches enjoyable for the whole family. Today's film is "The Thirteenth Guest" with a 21 year old Ginger Rogers.

metadata.Plot: 13 years before the movie opens, there was a dinner party, at which the 13th guest failed to show up. The master of the manor has died, and left the bulk of his estate to this 13th guest, but nobody knows who that is. Now someone is murdering the remaining guests, and placing their dead bodies at the table, in the same seat they had occupied 13 years before.
